title: Kielbasa with Brussels Sprouts
summary: Kielbasa with Brussels Sprouts might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe serves 4 and costs $1.64 per serving. One serving contains 430 calories, 21g of protein, and 34g of fat. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, and whole 30 diet. It is brought to you by Allrecipes. A mixture of salt and ground pepper, canolan oil, kielbasa sausage, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. To use up the canolan oil you could follow this main course with the Cherry-Apricot Turnovers as a dessert. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 58%, which is pretty good. Similar recipes include Roasted Brussels Sprouts, Potatoes and Kielbasa, Kielbasa With Brussels Sprouts In Mustard Cream Sauce, and Brussels Sprouts Baaji (indian Spiced Brussels Sprouts).
instructions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sausage and onion. Cook and stir until onion is translucent, 8 to 10 minutes. Add the Brussels sprouts, and cook 10 minutes more. Season with salt and pepper to taste.                                                Kitchen-Friendly View

steps.step: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the sausage and onion. Cook and stir until onion is translucent, 8 to 10 minutes.
Add the Brussels sprouts, and cook 10 minutes more. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
